species.name: yungoos
descriptions: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.
Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It’s a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk, it collapses from exhaustion and falls asleep on the spot.
With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

abilities.name: strong-jaw
abilities.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.
